meanings.definition: The inner chamber of a Greek temple.
meanings.sent1: The naos in the temple was where the statue of the god was kept.

meanings.sent4: The naos of knowledge held the secrets of the ancient civilization.
meanings.sent5: The dimly lit naos felt mysterious and sacred as we entered.
